DOC.brief_title: Agitated Saline , Albumin , Propofol-albumin Mixture Enhanced Contrast TEE Examinations
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , control study determine albumin propofol albumin provide superior qualitative contrast enhancement TEE bubble study compare current standard care contrast agent , agitate saline . The study take place Operating Rooms ( OR ) UCSD Sulpizio Cardiovascular Center . The TEE study review UCSD Anesthesiology Cardiology faculty credentialed read interpret echocardiographic study . The study population consist 20 English-speaking patient receive two dos contrast , namely agitate albumin propofol albumin mixture , undergo cardiac surgery require TEE . Each patient undergo qualitative review 10 anesthesiologist and/or cardiologist credentialed read echocardiographic study time surgical procedure , also retrospective review echo video . The multiple reviewer per patient increase power study ( ~200 study ) . Each patient receive three bubble study use 10 ml agitate contrast agent name . The order contrast agent utilized , well experimental contrast agent , randomize interpret physician blind information . Agitated saline ( AS ) alone use ( third dose ) control patient , current standard contrast agent TEE bubble study . The bubble study use experimental agitate contrast agent , either mixture 7 mL albumin 3 mL propofol ( 10 mg/ml ) 10 mL albumin ( human ) . Saline albumin 5 % intravenous fluid FDA approve use restoration maintenance circulate blood volume . Propofol FDA approve use induction maintenance general anesthesia . The anesthesia care team , per standard care UCSD cardiac surgical procedure , place TEE probe induction general anesthesia endotracheal intubation . During initial TEE exam , bicaval view obtain . Both order type experimental agitate contrast agent randomize blind sonographer reviewer . A 20 beat loop record bubble study . Hemodynamic variables prior injection contrast agent ; 30 second , 1 minute 2 minute injection monitor record . All record data anonymized prior review . TEE standard care routinely use care cardiac surgery patient perform solely study . All anesthetic , surgical medical intervention choose carry surgical anesthesia team , include involve invasive monitor placement , fluid administration , ventilator management patient positioning . Appropriate statistical analysis utilized evaluate difference contrast enhancement saline , albumin , albumin propofol group . The result study publish peer-reviewed medical literature .
